DOC.brief_title: Study to Evaluate the Immunogenicity and the Safety of an Adjuvanted Influenza Vaccine Candidate
DOC.criteria: Subjects who the investigator believes that they can and wil comply with the requirements of the protocol should be enrolled in the study. A male or female 60 years or older at the time of the first vaccination. Free of obvious health problems Use of nonregistered products Administration of immunemodifying drugs. Administration of vaccine 30 days before enrolment in study. Immunosuppressive or immunodeficient condition. Hypersensitivity to a previous dose of influenza vaccine Acute clinically significant pulmonary, cardiovascular, hepatic or renal functional abnormality. History of confirmed influenza infection within the last 12 Months. Acute disease at the time of enrolment/vaccination. History of allergy or reactions likely to be exacerbated by any component of the vaccine
